alert.note: Alert for Davie (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Davie County through 230 AM EDT... At 159 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles east of Yadkinville, or near Shacktown, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bermuda Run, Advance and Farmington. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
